chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini has the above problem:

Hello,
The phone was ordered in excellent condition, but one can definitely notice significant wear and tear. The real problem is the battery. It consumes too much power, even though the capacity is at 100%. Therefore, I request a refund.

Thank you very much.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JY
